parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Mods and Addons

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Check if file is signed by any key present in game keys folders. Note: On client, it does not check against the keys accepted by server.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[Boolean]] <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>=</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext> '''verifySignature''' filename

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> filename: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[verifySignature]] "@MyAddon\Addons\SomeAddon.pbo";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[verifySignature]] "@MyAddon\Somefnc.dll";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ArmA: Addon Signatures]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
